title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Be Shark Smart at the Beach this Summer  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Be Shark Smart at the Beach this Summer  Great white sharks inhabit the marine ecosystem. They feed on seals, which are common in Cape Cod waters. Read advisories at beaches. https://www.nps.gov/caco/learn/news/summer-2016-cape-cod-national-seashore-great-white-shark-safety-message.htm more     Information        Sections of Boardwalk Closed at Red Maple Swamp Trail  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Sections of Boardwalk Closed at Red Maple Swamp Trail  Sections of the boardwalk at the Red Maple Swamp Trail have been closed due to structural deterioration and safety concerns. For your safety, remain out of closed areas. Repairs to the trail will be underway in fall, 2016.
